text: Rodolfo Certeza Severino Jr. (27 April 1936 â€“ 19 April 2019) was a Filipino diplomat. He served as the 10th Secretary-General of the Association of Southeast Asian Nations (ASEAN) from 1998 to 2002. He also served as the ambassador to Malaysia from 1989 to 1992. He was a professor at many universities in Singapore. He was born in Manila. Severino died of problems caused by Parkinson's disease on 19 April 2019. He was 82. ==References== Category:1936 births Category:2019 deaths Category:ASEAN Category:Ambassadors of the Philippines Category:Filipino academics Category:Politicians from Manila
title: Rodolfo Severino Jr.
